name: Island Conquerers
description:
Island Conquerers is a turned based 4 player local multiplayer board game. About 4 people conquering small islands. Whoever has the most points after 60 turns wins.

There are 4 types of tiles:

  1. Water tile (worth 0 points)
  2. Grass tile (worth 1 point)
  3. House tile (worth 2 points)
  4. Mine tile (worth 3 points)

Good Luck!

Controls: Move piece: WASD Mentions:
 Sound effects made with SFXR (https://www.drpetter.se/project_sfxr.html) Tips: Stick to the center since it is worth the most
